analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x283554e720852212d00e1f999ef4af2516fd432a.sol:
	Contract SnowdenToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x283554e720852212d00e1f999ef4af2516fd432a.sol#205-206)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
parent in SnowdenToken.removeFromAccountList (/unique_chucks/23/0x283554e720852212d00e1f999ef4af2516fd432a.sol#461) is a local variable never initialiazed

SnowdenToken.requireTrade (/unique_chucks/23/0x283554e720852212d00e1f999ef4af2516fd432a.sol#267-283) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(timestamp < block.timestamp,Trades from your account are temporarily not possible. This is due to ICO rules.) (/unique_chucks/23/0x283554e720852212d00e1f999ef4af2516fd432a.sol#279-280)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(timestamp < block.timestamp,Trades from your account are temporarily not possible. This is due to ICO rules.)

analysis.description: Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x283554e720852212d00e1f999ef4af2516fd432a.sol#94) is not in mixedCase
SnowdenToken.MAX_256 (/unique_chucks/23/0x283554e720852212d00e1f999ef4af2516fd432a.sol#136-138) is never used in SnowdenToken
